## Basic Information

This is our second iteration of offering (Re)Entering Mentoring as an online webinar series for the LTER network. Thank you so much for joining us, and committing some time this semester to mentorship. We are really looking forward to working and growing with you.

This workshop series is based on materials developed by: Center for the Improvement of Mentored Experiences in Research (CIMER) Wisconsin Center for Educational Research, University of Wisconsin-Madison 1025 W. Johnson Street, Madison, WI 53705; (608) 265-2419 [cimer@wcer.wisc.edu](cimer@wcer.wisc.edu); [cimerproject.org](https://cimerproject.org/).

We have created this website to serve as a hub for information during and after the series, and more information will be added throughout.
